page.title: 06 LAW AND ORDER POLICE
page.content: The Headquarters of the Lancashire Police is in Hutton.From here the whole of the Lancashire Police divisions are run.The person responsible for the running of Lancashire Police Force is Chief Constable Johnson.There are five assistant Chief Constables one of which is Joe Mounsey who is head of C.I.D.He became well known while investigating the moors murders.All information is recorded in the Lancashire Criminal Records Office. Lancashire was one of the first forces to introduce the Juvenile Courts.THe Department was set up to keep children out and detention centres. To become a policeman you have to pass a number of tests.They train for 2-3 years before joining the force.The mounted section is at Holmehead,along with the tracker dogs.
